title: Flag of Greece
cardDescription: The flag of Greece is based on nine equal horizontal stripes of blue alternating with white. There is a blue canton in the upper hoist-side corner bearing a white cross.
description: The flag of Greece is based on nine equal horizontal stripes of blue alternating with white. There is a blue canton in the upper hoist-side corner bearing a white cross.

content.content: There is no need to cut the yarn when doing the first four horizontal stripes (counting from the bottom). Attach a new white yarn at row 9 to do the white cross with. Also attach another blue yarn at row 11 and use it to do the four corners of the canton.
This pattern is worked horizontally starting from bottom left.

content: With A, ch 29, sc in 2nd ch and each ch across, turn
Ch 1, sc 21, sab, sc 1, sba, sc 4, turn
Ch 1, sc 3, sab, sc 1, sba, sc 21, sab, turn
Ch 1, sc 17, sba, sc 3, sab, sc 1, sba, sc 4, turn
Ch 1, sc 3, sab, sc 1, sba, sc 3, sab, sc 18, turn
Ch 1, sc 17, sba, sc 3, sab, sc 1, sba, sc 4, turn
Ch 1, sc 3, sab, sc 1, sba, sc 3, sab, sc 18, turn
Ch 1, sc 21, sab, sc 1, sba, sc 4, turn
Ch 1, sc 3, sab, sc 1, sba, sc 22
